bug.author: ankushagarwal
bug.summary: [gcp click-to-deploy] hostname field is not editable
bug.description:
Repro instructions <denchmark-code>cd components/gcp-click-to-deploy npm install npm start
# Open web ui # Try editing the hostname field in the form </denchmark-code>
Browser: Chrome <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jlewi>@jlewi</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yebrahim>@yebrahim</denchmark-link>
